Reference

epi_df basics

Details on epi_df format, and basic functionality.

epi_df

epi_df object

as_epi_df()

Convert to epi_df format

print(<epi_df>) summary(<epi_df>) arrange(<epi_df>) filter(<epi_df>) group_by(<epi_df>) group_modify(<epi_df>) mutate(<epi_df>) relocate(<epi_df>) rename(<epi_df>) slice(<epi_df>) ungroup(<epi_df>) unnest(<epi_df>)

S3 methods for an epi_df object

epi_*() functions

Functions that act on epi_df objects.

epi_slide()

Slide a function over variables in an epi_df object

epi_cor()

Compute correlations between variables in an epi_df object

Vector functions

Functions that act directly on signal variables.

growth_rate()

Estimate growth rate

detect_outlr()

Detect outliers

detect_outlr_rm()

Detect outliers based on a rolling median

detect_outlr_stl()

Detect outliers based on an STL decomposition

epi_archive basics

Details on epi_archive, and basic functionality.

epi_archive

epi_archive object

as_epi_archive()

Convert to epi_archive format

epix_*() functions

Functions that act on an epi_archive object.

epix_as_of()

Generate a snapshot from an epi_archive object

epix_merge()

Merge two epi_archive objects

epix_slide()

Slide a function over variables in an epi_archive object
